explanation: [0-0] A girl with messy hair is sitting on a bed, holding a pair of white panties in her hand. On the wall behind her, there is a picture and a small lamp.

[0-6] She then holds the white panties up to her nose and smells them, a happy smile spreading across her face. Suddenly, the scene cuts to a wider shot, revealing the entire room. The girl is sitting on the bed, next to a man in white clothes who is playing with his phone. The girl stretches her foot towards the man, who immediately becomes enraged. Green smoke emits from his body as he angrily kicks the girl and the panties away. The girl falls to the ground, looking dejected.
